name: Super Moon Cresta
overview:
Super Moon Cresta is a bootleg/hack of Moon Cresta. It was released by UPL in 1980.

Destroy attacking alien swarms and dock with your ship. Avoid the bombs the aliens drop.

This is the same as the Gremlin version of Moon Cresta except faster and the aliens drop bombs at you.

This game is a hack/ROM swap for Moon Cresta board sets.
